message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good starting point.
I think a 60/40 split is a fair starting point.  Since I'm making the proposal, I'm taking the larger share. Let's see if we can agree.
Okay, Bob.  Let's split it 70/30 in my favor.  I'm willing to move a bit, but not much more.  This is a fair compromise, considering the inflation and that you're losing value on your side.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to go down to 40% to make this work, but I need to see some movement on your side.  We're both losing value with each passing round.
